column1: The two young cruisers in the motor boat could not say a single word when these astounding words reached their ears.Meanwhile the other craft had drawn quickly nearer
column2: and Jack could even make out the fact that the men crowded in her seemed to be in some sort of uniform
column3: for he certainly discovered brass buttons.Then it was not a joke
column4: nor yet some sort of trick being played by cunning river vagrants in order to catch the boys off their guard.Jimmie was rubbing his eyes
column6: as though he began to believe he might be dreaming."Don't think of offering any resistance
column7: you rascals!" continued the gruff voice in the nearby boat; "because we're ready to give you a volley. Take hold there
column8: Grogan. Now aboard with you!"A couple of burly men came sliding into the natty little motor boat. Then lights flashed in the faces of the two astonished occupants."Say
column10: Cap!" exclaimed the man who had grasped hold of Jack
column11: as the glow of his lantern illuminated the face of the skipper of the Tramp.
